hero.subtitle: Stop losing knowledge to turnover and fragmentation. Context.ai turns your scattered docs, processes, and expertise into a living, intelligent knowledge base that onboards and empowers your team 24/7.

features.title: Everything You Need to Scale Knowledge
features.subtitle: Purpose-built for startups where everyone wears multiple hats and knowledge is the most valuable — and vulnerable — asset.

sectors.title: Knowledge Sectors
sectors.description: Create isolated knowledge bases for each department. Engineering, HR, Sales -- each with their own context and access controls.

ingestion.title: Multimodal Ingestion
ingestion.description: Upload PDFs, Markdown files, or external links. Our RAG pipeline indexes everything into searchable, intelligent knowledge.

qa.title: AI-Powered Q&A
qa.description: Employees ask questions in natural language and get answers grounded exclusively in your company documentation.

capsules.title: Auto-Generated Capsules
capsules.description: Automatically create onboarding scripts, audio guides, and learning materials from your uploaded documents.

analytics.title: Sentiment Analytics
analytics.description: Track how helpful your documentation is. Sentiment analysis on queries reveals gaps and improvement opportunities.

access.title: Role-Based Access
access.description: RBAC ensures sensitive information stays compartmentalized. HR docs stay in HR, engineering in engineering.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your fragmented knowledge into an intelligent, always-available teammate.

upload.title: Upload Your Knowledge
upload.description: Create sectors for each department and upload your documentation — PDFs, Markdown, or links. Context.ai handles the rest.

index.title: AI Indexes & Learns
index.description: Our RAG pipeline breaks documents into embeddings, building a vectorized knowledge graph that understands relationships and context.

answer.title: Your Team Asks, AI Answers
answer.description: Employees get instant, accurate answers grounded in your documentation. Every response includes source citations for transparency.

useCases.title: Built for Real Startup Challenges
useCases.subtitle: Every feature addresses a pain point we experienced firsthand in our own fast-moving team.

onboarding.title: Autonomous Onboarding
onboarding.description: Self-guided onboarding journeys with AI-generated capsules, video scripts, and interactive Q&A tutor available 24/7.

retention.title: Knowledge Retention
retention.description: When team members leave, their expertise stays. Critical processes, decisions, and know-how persist in the platform.

crossFunctional.title: Cross-Functional Roles
crossFunctional.description: Wearing multiple hats? Quickly access processes from departments outside your specialty without interrupting colleagues.

quality.title: Documentation Quality
quality.description: Sentiment analytics reveal which docs help and which confuse. Continuously improve your knowledge base with data.

cta.title: Ready to Stop Losing Knowledge?
cta.subtitle: Join the teams transforming how they preserve, share, and scale their collective intelligence.
